unalcol.optimization.real.mutation

Class GaussianMutation

  • java.lang.Object
    • unalcol.search.population.variation.Operator<T>
      • unalcol.search.space.ArityOne<double[]>
        • unalcol.optimization.real.mutation.Mutation
          • unalcol.optimization.real.mutation.IntensityMutation
            • unalcol.optimization.real.mutation.GaussianMutation

  • public class GaussianMutation
extends IntensityMutation

    Title: GaussianMutation

    Description: Changes one component of the encoded double[] with a number randomly generated following a Gaussian distribution with mean the old value of the component and the given standard deviation

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2010

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jonatan Gomez

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GaussianMutation(double sigma)
      Creates a Gaussian Mutation with the given standard deviation per component
